original: 曾任西園八校尉之一的下軍校尉，討豫州黃巾軍有功。但因侵盜官物，貪贓千萬，被黃琬舉發，下獄處死。
text: One of the eight lieutenants of the Xiyuan Army, who once served as one of the eight lieutenants of the West Park, sought merits from the Yellow Turban Army of Yuzhou. But because of embezzling official property and embezzling millions of dollars, Huang Wan was sent to prison and executed.
